name: Lazy Lakes
description:
Welcome to Lazy Lakes Campsite! 

Play as Vicky,  a young adult fresh out of college as you take a camping trip with your soon to be fiancé Josh and a few friends to a lovely camping destination called Lazy Lakes. Everything starts off just as you'd hoped, however you soon find out the camping trip is turning out to be a living nightmare as you uncover a dark history tied to the location and its residents.



Lazy Lakes is a casual story focused adventure game with a mild twist of horror.  Go exploring Lazy Lakes and see the scenery, with branching dialogue and different choices for you to take.
